alert.note: Alert for Inland Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Nassau and southwestern Camden Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kings Ferry, or 7 miles southwest of Woodbine, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kings Ferry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
